settings.title: Introducing Fièra  <br class="forMob">Multi-Effect Neck + Décolletage Cream
settings.sub_title: A surprising non-surgical solution to making the stubborn neck area look young again. Formulated specifically for the thin, delicate skin of the neck area.
settings.content: It’s no surprise that neck aging completely betrays a woman's age. Luckily, a neck-lift is not the only option. This powerful blend of ingredients targets the underlying issues that cause rapid neck-aging and in turn, reduces the appearance of wrinkles, fine lines, skin sag and other imperfections on the neck.

settings.title: How Fièra Multi-Effect Neck<br class="forMob"> + Décolletage Cream Works
settings.sub_title: Fièra Multi-Effect Neck + Décolletage Cream is the crepey, sagging, “turkey neck” solution to achieving the tight, firm, and glowing neck of your yester-years. Formulated specifically for the thin, delicate skin of the neck area, simply rub it on the neck to initiate an amazing sculpting effect around the jawline, taking years off in a matter of seconds and only improving the neck over time.
settings.title_1: Tightens up crepey, sagging neck skin
settings.content_1: Sculpts and tightens that sagging, loose skin, revealing a much smoother, firmer and younger-looking neck
settings.title_2: Reduces the appearance of sun damage
settings.content_2: Powerful antioxidant activity helps protect and reduce the appearance of sun damage and free radicals
settings.content_3: Hydrating ingredients like hyaluronic acid and shea butter help moisturize and hydrate the skin, reducing wrinkly, dry-looking skin
settings.title_4: Banishes fine lines, wrinkles and age spots
settings.content_4: Exfoliates the outermost dead layer of skin, unveiling a smoother, more firm set of skin, free from fine lines, wrinkles and age spots

settings.title: Our Fièra Promise
settings.content: Fièra is not your average beauty line. We offer the highest quality products with unstoppable results. Our products focus on delivering innovative science, quality, and convenience. Not just a beauty brand, Fièra is committed to supporting our community through our partnerships with Food Rescue US and Second Harvest by donating a portion of our sales to help feed those in need.

settings.title: Shea Butter
settings.content: A rich, cream-colored substance that has natural soothing and moisturizing properties, significantly increasing skin hydration, giving the skin a more dewy, natural feel.

settings.title: Green Tea Extract
settings.content: Helps protect against free radical damage and UV rays, while also reducing the appearance of sun-damaged skin.

settings.title: Squalane
settings.content: For skin collagen, moisturizes and protects the skin from oxidative damage, resulting in tighter, more hydrated skin softness.

settings.title: Willow Bark Extract
settings.content: Has been used for centuries to naturally soothe irritated skin, detoxify the pores, and rejuvenate the skin.

settings.title: Vitamin E
settings.content: A potent antioxidant, among the best for protecting against free radicals and sun damage.

settings.title: Glycolic Acid
settings.content: Removes dead skin cells and impurities leading to a reduction in the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, while also making skin look brighter and healthier.

settings.title: Glycerin
settings.content: A “super hydrator” that firms, tightens, and accelerates skin softness.

settings.title: Sodium Hyaluronate
settings.content: The sodium salt of hyaluronic acid, able to hold more water than any other natural substance—up to 1000 times its weight in water for maximum skin hydration that tightens and improves the skin’s overall appearance.

settings.title: Active Ingredients
settings.sub_title: What sets this neck cream apart from the rest? Clinically-proven ingredients that work together to create the perfect environment for your skin, turning back the clock on the appearance of your neck.
settings.popup_content: Water (Aqua), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Squalane, Phenyl Trimethicone Cetyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Glycolic Acid, Glyceryl Stearate, Canola Oil, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Sorbitan Stearate, Sodium Hyaluronate, PEG-100 Stearate, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Silica, Glycosaminoglycans, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Sodium Hydroxide, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Xanthan Gum, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Cellulose Gum, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Sodium Hydroxide, Cholesterol, Geranium Maculatum Oil, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Extract, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Hexylene Glycol, Tetrasodium EDTA.

settings.content: Apply gently to the neck and décolleté in a circular motion.
For maximum neck-tightening benefits, use daily for as long as you want to improve your neck.
Enjoy your new, youthful and tight neck as it continues to improve with prolonged use.
